name: CBPeripheralManagerAuthorizationStatus
desc: Values representing the current authorization state of the peripheral manager.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: An authorization status that indicates the user hasn’t indicated whether this app can share data using Bluetooth while in the background.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: An authorization status that indicates this app isn’t authorized to share data using Bluetooth while in the background.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: An authorization status that indicates the user explicitly denied this app from sharing data using Bluetooth while in the background.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: An authorization status that indicates the user authorized this app to share data using Bluetooth while in the background.
